chapters.title: Chapter 1: High Chasaline
chapters.info: Aram, p. 57 (60)—Former Tuatha'an who gave up the Way of the Leaf to learn the sword when the Trollocs killed his mother. He learned from Tam al'Thor, Rand's father and a Blademaster, and picked it up extremely fast. He now serves as Perrin's personal bodyguard. See also al'Thor, Tamlin; Aybara, Perrin t'Bashere.
